G

Game - Class in dkeep.logic
Game.java - class that manages the game, keeps record of levels, saves and reads data from files
Game(Map, Hero, Guard) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Game
Constructor used to create a new dungeon type game, only for saving purposes.
Game(Map, Hero, Ogre[]) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Game
Constructor used to create a new keep type game, only for saving and testing an edited level.
Game() - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Game
Constructor used to play the default game levels saved in level1.map and keep.map
getBasher() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Hero
Gets hero's basher status (if he has it or not)
getBat() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Ogre
Gets the ogre's bat position
getDoors() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Map
Gets the doors's positions
getGuard() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Gets the guard in the current level
getGuard() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Guard
Gets the guard path
getGuardpos() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Guard
Gets the guard's current position in it's path
getHero() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Gets the current hero state in the current level
getHero() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Hero
Gets hero's position in the map
getKey() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Map
Gets the key status (caught or not)
getKeyPos() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Map
Gets the key's coordinates
getMap() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Gets the current map state in the current level
getMap() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Map
gets the array with the map as it would be presented in an interface
getMapType() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Map
Gets the level's type
getOgre() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Game
Gets the ogres in the current level
getOgre() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Ogre
Gets the ogre's position
getStunned() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Ogre
Gets the stunned status of the ogre
Guard - Class in dkeep.logic
Class that saves the guard info in a Dungeon type level, keeps record of the guard's path, its current position, its personality and if it is asleep in case of a drunken personality
Guard(int[][], int) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Guard
Creates a guard given its personality and its successive positions
GuardMove(Map) - Method in class dkeep.logic.Guard
Moves the guard to it's next position in the path given its type (a rookie's next position index is current+1, a drunken may be asleep and may change movement direction when he wakes up, a suspicious guard may change its direction randomly); the method also updates the guard's position in the map.
